attributes.action: dissolve the United Kingdom, make England, Scotland & Wales a republic "Republic of Britannia"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britannia for the British people and Ireland for the Irish people.

Dissolve the United Kingdom, make England, Scotland & Wales a republic "Republic of Britannia".
Give the Northern Ireland to the Republic of Ireland. And finally give total independency for the rest of the Commonwealth Nations

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
